description: This file is a Java source file that defines a global exception handler for a Spring Boot REST application, managing various exception responses in a consistent format.

classes.name: GlobalExceptionHandler

methods.name: basicBody
methods.description: Creates a standard error response body including timestamp, status, error, and message.

methods.description: Handles EventNotFoundException and returns 404 Not Found response.
